summary: The identifier function saves time by quickly detecting specific strings in a dataset, while long-running functions ensure accurate results. Some functions execute system commands to achieve this.

details.comment: The identifier function saves time by quickly detecting specific strings in a dataset, while long-running functions ensure accurate results. Some functions execute system commands to achieve this.
details.content:
the identifier function is saving the time. it is a long running daemon. only taking few miliseconds to run.
such as detecting "http" string inside a bunch of pdf octave stream or so on. but actually visiting a website can be painstaking.
many long-term function that does not grarantee the result to be correct therefore some identifier functions pops up. like executing system command
